title: Weliweriya : Attempting a “Sri Lankan Spring” through a Civil Coup D’etat
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – The tragedy that befell Weliweriya has given early Christmas for those who had been splitting hairs wondering how to serve their sponsors to showcase a state of chaos in Sri Lanka. The usual coterie of anti-Sri Lankan destabilizing operators some of whom are columnists were quick to action writing…
